data.name: Dragonclaw Hook
data.item_description: The claw from a black dragon's left toe. The only piece of the beast that survived an encounter with Pudge's voracious hunger.

data.name: Chained Snatcher
data.item_description: Never give a meal the chance to be late for dinner.

data.name: Chained Chopper
data.item_description: Tangled in the links of Pudge's chains, a reminder of the shackles that bind us to life--and how easily Pudge may break them.

data.name: Bloodstained Britches
data.item_description: "You don't get this good at butchery without spending a bit of time on a farm."

data.name: Rotten Stache
data.item_description: 'Thought it was time to try me out a new look.  What you think?'

data.name: Flesh Ripper
data.item_description: "Ah, flesh meat!"

data.name: Heavy Tenderizer
data.item_description: A few quick turns under Pudge's Tenderizer, and even the toughest foe goes down like butter.

data.name: Taunt: Shake Your Money Maker
data.item_description: Watch as Pudge "Shakes his Money Maker" while his foes cannot look away!

data.name: Chopper of the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: Ain't nothing a bit of cutting can't improve.

data.name: Hook of the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: You want your meat tender, right?  Gotta bring it in close for that.

data.name: Rope of the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: If them intestines wanna be out, may as well put em to use!

data.name: Mask of the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: It's a lot funnier when the meat can't see what killed it.

data.name: Nails in the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: If there's a better way to keep a shoulder together, I ain't heard it.

data.name: Restraint of the Mad Harvester
data.item_description: If you're gonna strap a man down, make sure to use a sturdy table.

data.name: Meat Dragger
data.item_description: Sometimes the meat won't go nowhere unless you drag it.

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Grizzled Face
data.item_description: Some folk talk about a crazy man up in them woods, finding and cutting on those what come through. But I know better. I ain't crazy.

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Cleaver
data.item_description: It's dull, but it's heavy.  When it's to bone and meat, heavy counts for more.

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Choppin' Arm
data.item_description: This the arm I do me choppin' with!

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Chains
data.item_description: I once made me a bracelet with a bit of spare ankle, but it kept coming apart. Some chain helped with that.

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Meat Jacket
data.item_description: Why go to the trouble of a proper butcherin' if you can't show it off?

data.name: Ol' Chopper's Dinner Bringer
data.item_description: Y'know, someone once told me it ain't the hook catching you that really hurts, but when I take it back out.

data.name: Whalehook
data.item_description: Ideally, a hook made for reeling in enormous creatures of the deep would not gouge and hack into the bones and flesh of the prey. But Pudge doesn't much care if he makes a mess of his meat.

data.name: Grievous Grapnel
data.item_description: There's no time for grappling with your conscience when your dinner is getting away.

data.name: Blood Drainer
data.item_description: A hook designed to pierce foes in multiple areas upon impact and draw blood as Pudge reels in his prey.

data.name: Shoulder Block of Delicacies of Butchery
data.item_name: Shoulder Block of Delicacies of Butchery

data.name: Emblazoned Arm of Delicacies of Butchery
data.item_name: Emblazoned Arm of Delicacies of Butchery

data.name: Insatiable Bonesaw
data.item_description: A hideous combination of machine and castoff body parts, the Insatiable Bonesaw uses a reticulating row of dragonâ€™s teeth to saw through even the most stubborn of armor.

data.name: Crazed Tassels of the Black Death
data.item_name: Crazed Tassels of the Black Death

data.name: Wrist Shackles of the Black Death
data.item_name: Wrist Shackles of the Black Death

data.name: Axe of the Black Death Executioner
data.item_name: Axe of the Black Death Executioner

data.name: Cuff Hook of the Black Death
data.item_name: Cuff Hook of the Black Death

data.name: Execution Headclamp of the Black Death
data.item_name: Execution Headclamp of the Black Death

data.name: Tools of the Mad Harvester Set
data.item_name: Tools of the Mad Harvester Set
data.item_description: Includes all of the items in the 'Tools of the Mad Harvester' set for Pudge:

data.name: The Ol' Chopper's Set
data.item_description: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Ol' Copper's Set' for Pudge:

data.name: Chained Slayers Set
data.item_description: This bundle contains all of the items in 'Chained Slayers' for Pudge:

data.name: The Butcher's Broilers Pack
data.item_description: These items were created in partnership with D2L, who receives a portion of every purchase.

data.name: The Butcher's Broilers Pack - Finals Gift
data.item_name: The Butcher's Broilers Pack - Finals Gift
data.item_description: These items were created in partnership with D2L, who receives a portion of every purchase.

data.name: Delicacies of Butchery Set
data.item_description: Includes all of the items in the 'Delicacies of Butchery' set for Pudge plus loading screen:

data.name: Murder of Crows
data.item_description: Shoulda' kept your beak out of this.These items commemorate the release of Valve's documentary, Free to Play, and were created in partnership with Dendi, who receives a portion of every purchase.

data.name: Gladiator's Revenge
data.item_description: Includes all of the items in the 'Gladiator's Revenge' set for Pudge:
